alert.note: Alert for St. Tammany; Tangipahoa; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 12:26PM CST until December 14 at 1:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 100 PM CST. * At 1226 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Natalbany, or near Hammond, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hammond, Franklinton, Folsom, Natalbany and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 34 and 38. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana.
